wikipedia_page.main: The Reverend Adrian Victor Benjamin (born 1942) is a prebendary emeritus of St. Paul's Cathedral (appointed in October 2007) and a former actor who has appeared with Richard Burton and Elizabeth Taylor.He is a graduate of Wadham College, Oxford (BA, 1966; MA, 1968).  He was vicar of All Saint's Church, Friern Barnet from 1975 until 2012, and the religious editor for the ITV Oracle service since 1983.He played the Pope in the film Dr Faustus (1967).He was a contestant on The Search.

response: | A 64-year-old vicar from London whose congregation at All Saints Church in WhetstoneHendon Times article concerning Adrian Benjamin includes Lady Thatcher. Educated at Oxford, Adrian read Theology and English. He returned to the show in Episode Seven to assist Simon in the finale.

link_mentions.page: List of Wadham College, Oxford people
response: * Adrian Benjamin, clergyman and former actor
